overview: Be a guest at a disguise party, as you haven't see the instruction on your invitation : here's the awkwardness ! Specially when animal disguise is the special theme ! Everything's gathered for a catastrophic reception ! Unless... if you know how to take advantage of it. As your primal instinct surfaced, you give a hard time to the other guests. Just for fun, in pure frivolity.
title: Roi de la jungle
